mapper.insert: insert into board ( boardTitle, boardContent, userId ) values ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: select b.boardId, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, b.boardLike, b.boardReadCount, b.userId, u.userNm, u.userProfile from board b inner join users u on u.userId = b.userId order by b.boardId desc limit ${limit} offset #{offset}

select b.boardId, b.userId, u.userNm, u.userProfile, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, b.boardLike, b.boardReadCount from board b, users u where b.userId = u.userId and b.boardTitle like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%') order by b.boardId desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from board where boardTitle like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%')

select b.boardId, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, b.boardLike, b.boardReadCount, b.userId, u.userEmail, u.userNm, u.userProfile from board b, users u where b.boardId = #{boardId} and u.userId = b.userId
select count(*) from board_user_read where boardId = #{boardId} and userId = #{userId}

mapper.select: select count(*) from board_user_like where boardId = #{boardId} and userId = #{userId}
